title: ACCOUNTANCY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Government,

Biology/Agricultural Science/Animal Husbandry/Fishery

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Computer Studies/ICT/Data Processing

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics.

title: AGRICULTURAL ENGINEERING/TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, Physics and any two (2) of the following:

Biology/Agricultural Science/ Animal Husbandry/Fishery

Chemistry

Technical Drawing

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity

Auto Mechanics

Metal Work

Further Mathematics

Food and Nutrition

Geography

Computer Studies/ICT/Data Processing
subjects: Mathematics and Physics/Technical Drawing, Chemistry or any two (2) Science subjects.

title: AGRICULTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

Computer Studies/ICT/Data processing

At least 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: ARCHITECTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics, English Language and any two (2) subjects from the following:

Biology,

Fine Art,

Chemistry,

History

English Language,

Geography,

Further Mathematics

Economics/Commerce,

Religious Knowledge,

Technical Drawing,

Business Method.

'O' Level pass in Fine Art or Technical Drawing will be an advantage.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Technical Drawing.

title: BANKING & FINANCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language (not Literature in English) and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Biology/Agricultural Science/Animal Husbandry/Fishery

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government/Civic Education

Typewriting

Computer Studies/ICT/Data Processing

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Economics, Geography, History, Government, Commerce or Principles of Accounts.

title: BUILDING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and Physics and any three (3) of the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Technical Drawing/Fine Art,

Chemistry,

Geography,

Further Mathematics

Woodwork,

Biology/Agricultural Science/Animal Husbandry/Fishery, Computer Studies/ICT/Data Processing,

Religious Knowledge,

Metal Work,

And at least a credit pass in English Language is Compulsory.  A pass in Art or Technical Drawing will be an advantage.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry or Fine Arts.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork for Civil Engineering Technology,

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

Computer Studies/ICT/Data Processing

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering a pass in Biology is required.

At least 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, a basic science and three (3) other subjects chosen from the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

Computer Studies/ICT/Data Processing

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics is compulsory.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Geography, Physics, Economics or Chemistry.

title: ELECTRICAL/ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.),

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

Computer Studies/ICT/Data Processing

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering. 'O' Level pass in Biology is required.

At least 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Computer Science/ICT/Data Processing

title: OFFICE TECHNOLOGY & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language (not Literature in English) and Mathematics and any three (3) of the following: Economics/Commerce, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, Literature in English, Geography, Office Practice, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, History/Government, Typewriting, Shorthand, Computer Studies/ICT/Data Processing
subjects:

1. Mathematics
2. Economics
3. Commerce

title: PUBLIC  ADMINISTRATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects of the following Economics/Commerce, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, Literature in English Geography, Office Practice Government, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, History/Government/Civic Education, Typewriting, Shorthand
subjects: Government, History and Economics

title: QUANTITY SURVEYING
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and Physics and any three (3) of the following Economics/Commerce, Technical Drawing/Fine Arts, Chemistry, Geography, Further Mathematics Woodwork, Biology/Agricultural Science, Animal Husbandry/Fishery, Religious Knowledge, Metal Work, Computer Studies/ICT/Data Processing and 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is Compulsory.  'O' Level pass in Art or Technical Drawing is required.
subjects: Any three (3) of Physics, Mathematics, Geography, Economics, Biology/Agricultural Science

title: SCIENCE LABORATORY TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and two (2) of Physics,

Biology/Agricultural Science/Health Science, Chemistry,

and two (2) other subjects from Technical Drawing, Metal or Wood Work, Basic Electricity, Geography, Further Mathematics, and Fine Arts.

'O' Level credit pass in each of the three (3) Basic Science subjects - Biology, Chemistry, Physics and a 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is compulsory.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science or Physics or Chemistry

title: STATISTICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Basic Science and any three (3) of the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science/Animal Husbandry/Fishery

English Language,

Typewriting,

Computer Studies/ICT/Data Processing


'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics are compulsory.
subjects:
Any of the three (3): 
1. Economics/  
     Commerce
2. History/Government
3. CRS/IS
4. Mathematics

utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and Physics and any other three (3) subjects from the following:

Further Mathematics,

Chemistry;

Technical Drawing/Fine Art,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

English Language,

Basic Electricity

At least 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is compulsory.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry/Agricultural Science, Biology, Economics, Mathematics and Physics

title: TRANSPORTATION PLANNING & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, not Literature in English, Mathematics, Geography and any three (2) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Biology/Agricultural Science/ Animal Husbandry/Fishery

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics

title: URBAN & REGIONAL PLANNING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Geography and three (3) other subjects from:

English Language,

Economics/Commerce,

Fine Art/Technical Drawing,

Further Mathematics,

Chemistry,

Physics,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

History/Government

Business Methods/Bookkeeping and Principles of Accounting

 

One of the three (3) subjects must be a basic science subject.  At least a credit pass in English Language is compulsory.
subjects: Geography and two (2) other subjects from course requirement.

title: WELDING & FABRICATION TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from Biology/ Agricultural Science, Technical Drawing, Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity, Auto Mechanics, Metal Work, Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Technology), Further Mathematics, English Language, Geography, Economics/ Commerce,Computer Studies/ICT/Data ProcessingAt least a credit pass in English Language is required.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry
